document.full_text: thierry henry scored two first-half goals and joel lindpere and juan agudelo added second-half goals as the red bulls defeated host d.c. united, 4-0, on thursday night.
document.title: sports briefing | soccer: henry scores 2 for red bulls
lines_and_colors: thierry henry scored two first-half goals and joel lindpere and juan agudelo added second-half goals as the red bulls defeated host d.c. united, 4-0, on thursday night.
